actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

actions.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

official_title: To make the rights and protections of the compensatory time provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 applicable to employees of the House of Representatives who are covered by the rights and protections of that Act.

summary.text: Applies specified provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 relating to compensatory time to employees of the House of Representatives who are covered by other provisions of that Act.

titles.title: To make the rights and protections of the compensatory time provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 applicable to employees of the House of Representatives who are covered by the rights and protections of that Act.
